episodes.title: TikTok Dance Cult EXPOSED - Robert Shinn's 7M Dancing for the Devil TRAP
episodes.description:
How Robert Shinn's 7M cult TRAPPED its viral TikTok stars, like Miranda Wilking, James Bdash Derrick, and Vik White (aka itsslavik). If you watched Netflix's Dancing for the Devil or not, this video is going to shock you.

Plus, an EXCLUSIVE: "Dancing for the Devil" executive producer interview dives into details the Netflix show couldn't get into.

Discover:
How 7M exploited dancers, amassing over MILLIONS
Images and interviews not featured in the Netflix documentary
Chilling parallels between the 7M / Shekinah Church dance cult and another cult
Why TikTok stars like Miranda Wilking are STILL trapped
Plus, the BREAKING news: The mysterious disappearance of dancer Nick Rain-0 - what really happened?

From forced marriages to financial manipulation, we reveal how this TikTok dance cult operated under millions of followers' noses. Is your favorite viral dancer trapped? Learn the warning signs now.
If you spend hours watching TikTok dance videos, like I have, this story will SHOCK you. The dark side of viral fame is more sinister than you ever imagined.

#7MCult #DancingForTheDevil #TikTokCult #RobertShinn #MirandaWilking #Bdash #krump 

DISCLAIMER: This video contains sensitive content. If you suspect someone is involved in a cult-like situation, please seek professional help.
